[Log traces to specific project | ğŸ¦œï¸ğŸ› ï¸ LangSmith](https://docs.smith.langchain.com/observability/how_to_guides/log_traces_to_project): LLM should read this page when needing to log traces to a specific project, changing the destination project statically or dynamically. This page explains how to set the project name for traces through environment variables or at runtime, with code examples in Python and TypeScript.
